title: Browse listings without authentication
description: Verify that visitors can browse the list of car listings without requiring authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the Home/Listings page as a visitor without logging in
Listings are displayed with essential information: car make, model, year, and price
Listings can be scrolled through and the page does not require an account

title: View detailed car listing information as visitor
description: Verify that visitors can view the details of a specific car listing without authentication.

steps.description: As a visitor, select a car listing from the Home/Listings page
The detailed listing page displays comprehensive information including description, features, images
No login or registration prompt blocks access to listing details

title: User registration with valid data
description: Verify the user registration process completes successfully with valid input data.

steps.description: Navigate to the Register page
Input valid registration information (username, email, password)
Submit the registration form
Registration is successful and user is redirected or prompted to login

title: User login with correct credentials
description: Validate that users can login with correct username/email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the Login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click the login button
Login is successful and user authentication context is updated
User is redirected to the Home/Listings or profile page

title: User login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails when incorrect credentials are used and proper error is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the Login page
Input invalid username/email and/or password
Click the login button
Login fails and a meaningful error message is displayed to the user
User remains on the login page without authentication context update

title: Logout clears authentication and redirects
description: Verify logout functionality properly clears user authentication and redirects appropriately.

steps.description: Login successfully as a user
Trigger the logout action
Authentication context/state is cleared
User is redirected to the Home/Listings page as a visitor

title: Client-side routing navigates between pages correctly
description: Verify navigation via client-side routing updates URL and renders correct page without full reload.

steps.description: From the Home/Listings page, navigate to the Services page
URL updates correctly reflecting the Services route
Services page renders without full page reload
Navigate to Listing Details page for a chosen car
URL reflects Listing Details route and relevant component is rendered

title: Authenticated user creates a car listing successfully
description: Verify that authenticated users can create new car listings and that the listing is retrievable.

steps.description: Login as a valid user
Navigate to the create new listing page or form
Enter valid car listing details (make, model, year, price, description)
Submit the new listing
Listing creation API returns success and listing ID
Query listings API or reload listings page
Newly created listing appears in the listings

title: Services catalog browsable by visitors
description: Verify that the services catalog is accessible and browsable without authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the Services page as a visitor
List of available services is displayed with service names and descriptions
Click on individual service for more details if available
Service details display correctly without requiring login

title: Submit a lead for a car listing as authenticated user
description: Verify that submitting leads for car listings as an authenticated user works and data is stored.

steps.description: Login as a valid user
Navigate to a specific car listing details page
Fill out and submit the lead form expressing interest
Lead submission API returns success response
Verify lead is recorded in backend (e.g. by admin or database check)

title: Submit a lead for a service as authenticated user
description: Verify that authenticated users can submit leads for services and the submissions are processed correctly.

steps.description: Login as a valid user
Navigate to the Services page and select a service
Fill and submit the lead submission form related to the service
Lead submission is successful and confirmed by API

title: Admin logs in and views users list
description: Verify that admin users can login successfully and view a list of users in the Admin Users page.

steps.description: Login with valid admin credentials
Navigate to Admin Users Management page
Users list is displayed with relevant user information

title: Admin approves a pending car listing
description: Verify that admin can approve a pending car listing and the change is reflected in UI and backend.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to listings approval section or page
Select a pending listing
Approve the listing via the UI
Listing status changes to approved visually
Query backend to ensure listing approval is persisted

title: Admin rejects a pending car listing
description: Verify admin can reject a pending car listing and updates are reflected properly.

steps.description: Login as admin
Go to pending listings approval page
Select a pending listing
Reject the listing
Listing is marked as rejected in the UI
Backend listing status reflects rejection

title: Local development environment starts successfully
description: Verify that local development environment with Docker Compose starts all services including API, frontend, and PostgreSQL database correctly.

steps.description: Run docker-compose up command in the local environment
All configured services start without errors: API server, frontend server, PostgreSQL database
Database container initializes and is ready to accept connections

title: Verify JWT based authentication token usage
description: Verify that after login, JWT tokens are received from the API and used in secured requests to the backend.

steps.description: Login and capture JWT token issued by the backend
Make authenticated API requests (e.g., create listing, submit lead) attaching the token
Backend accepts requests and authorizes user actions based on valid JWT
Make API request without token or with invalid token
Backend rejects requests with proper authorization error

title: Handle empty listings scenario gracefully
description: Verify that when there are no car listings available, the listings page displays an appropriate message.

steps.description: Ensure backend has zero listings
Visit Home/Listings page
Page shows a user-friendly message such as 'No listings available' instead of empty or broken UI

title: Attempt to create a listing with invalid or missing fields
description: Verify that listing creation form validates inputs and rejects missing or invalid data with error messages.

steps.description: Login as a valid user
Navigate to create listing form
Submit form with missing required fields (e.g. missing price or model)
Form displays validation errors preventing submission
Submit form with invalid data formats (e.g. text in numeric fields)
Appropriate validation errors are shown
